long_description: The Patagonia Black Hole daypack is a highly water-resistant, super-durable pack designed to carry your gear to the office, to the crag, or the beach. Holds your laptop, too. Cavernous main compartment contains 2 mesh pockets, key keeper and organizer panel; simple pocket holds most 17 in. laptops or a hydration reservoir, sold separately. Zippered lid pocket with moisture-shedding, reverse-coil zipper and daisy chain lash points; front panel has concealed pocket and additional Hypalon(R) lash points. Padded shoulder straps with load lifters, sternum strap and a simple webbing belt ensure a comfortable and secure carry. Compression-molded back panel sheds moisture and allows airflow. Side compression straps help manage different size loads in the Patagonia Black Hole daypack.
short_description: The Patagonia Black Hole daypack is a highly water-resistant, super-durable pack designed to carry your gear to the office, to the crag, or the beach. Holds your laptop, too.
